com.cscguru.client.ui

Class BoundBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.newdawn.slick.geom.Shape
      • org.newdawn.slick.geom.Rectangle
        • com.cscguru.client.ui.BoundBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IClickable, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Inventory, InventoryBox

    public abstract class BoundBox
extends org.newdawn.slick.geom.Rectangle
implements IClickable
    Entity-like base class to provide an interface for clickable objects (such as the inventory blocks).
    Author:
    Bryan Bennett
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
